name: Tamatem Team AAW - مغامرات العالم المجهول
name_original: Tamatem Team AAW - مغامرات العالم المجهول
description:
Our game مغامرات العالم المجهول is a table-top role playing game that gives the players the chance to immerse in a unique and exciting world filled with adventures, that will be  taking endless hours of play-time. 

Dive in مغامرات العالم المجهول and experience  magical adventures, tough choices and a great story telling game.

This game manual is localized by:

Younes Al Jada

Malaak Ziedan 

Dima al Moghraby
developers: Tamatem Team - Younes, Malaak and Dima.
